description: This file contains unit tests for the AppComponent in an Angular application, verifying its creation, title property, and rendering of the title in the DOM.

classes.name: AppComponent
classes.description: The component being tested, representing the root component of the Angular app.

methods.name: beforeEach
methods.description: Sets up the testing module asynchronously before each test.

methods.name: it('should create the app')
methods.description: Tests whether the AppComponent can be instantiated successfully.

methods.name: it(`should have the 'angular' title`)
methods.description: Checks if the 'title' property of AppComponent equals 'angular'.

methods.name: it('should render title')
methods.description: Verifies that the component renders the correct title text within an HTML element.
